field.value:
Facility to validate method invocation using interception.
This contribution depends on the patch at http://support.castleproject.org/projects/COMP/issues/view/COMP-ISSUE-70 to be applied.
The solution references are current pointing at a "libs" directory which is not included in the patch. That directory can be change to the normal build directory once the above patch has been applied and the Castle.Components.Validator.dll is updated with the needed changes.
